comment: Dark sugar with strong hints of overripe fruit (banana) with strong baking spices (think pumpkin pie) and tanned leather on the nose.  Smooth, spicy and sweet (not overly sweet) with vanilla and pipe tobacco a hint of leatheriness .  Smooth and enjoyable.
Tastes like the wheated bourbon, just stronger. More caramel sweetness, more kick. Medium body, excellent balance.
